title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin reacts to Brooks Koepka's decision to become the latest big-name golfer to join the LIV Golf Tour and points out the major mistake the PGA Tour made. He discusses the Brooklyn Nets as they are at an "impasse" with Kyrie Irving over a contract extension and why they're not close to contending in the Eastern Conference. He also shares his top 10 most important players in NBA history. Plus, Gonzaga head coach Mark Few joins the show to talk about his former player Chet Holmgren and how he'll translate to the NBA ahead of Thursday's draft. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
